lines.text: What if they cast <c=#FF0000>Emergency Exit</c> on the bullet, so it teleported through the fire?
And when it came out, it was facing another direction- or maybe it came out behind Slick!
Huh- that could make a lot of sense...
Except it doesn't have a dang thing to do with puttin' a sticker on the thing.
Also, they don't know that spell. We figured that out. It was a whole big deal.
Well, what if they turned the bullet <c=#0000FF>to stone</c> first?
Also, bullets ain't made outta flesh.
Also, even if it did work, it wouldn't help in the slightest.
I dunno why you're still <c=#FF00FF>keepin' those things in mind-</c> we're done with those.
(Right... I can press A or D to manage evidence.)
